name: Crypto Hub
description:
Crypto Hub a game made by FundsFi! 

A Game where you can host many live metaverse events like Concerts / AMA's etc. 

V0.9 Features:
3 Map Reigons
Chatting 
Username
Stadium

RoadMap: 
Character Custmization
PC Version with microphone
Blockchain NFT's integration
PvP Game mode
Racing Game Mode

Projects can apply to host events with FundsFi here: 
Ads Applications coming soon! (If you would like to place ads in game)
